<<<<<<< HEAD
The country farmer a song / set by Mr. Jeremiah Clark. Clarke, Jeremiah, 1669?-1707. D'Urfey, Thomas, 1653-1723.
1 score (1 sheet)
s.n., [London : 1700?]
For voice and flute. Lyrics attributed by Wing to D'Urfey. Imprint suggested by Wing. First staff reads: Hark the cock crow'd, tis day all abroad, and looks like a jolly fair morning. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======
